pullrequest.title: Pass through for the comms model.

content.raw:
You should be able to test using:

1. `ign launch cloudsim_sim.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG1`
2. `ign launch cloudsim_bridge.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG1  robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG1`
content.html:
You should be able to test using:

  1. ign launch cloudsim_sim.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG1
  2. ign launch cloudsim_bridge.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG1
